definition: to behead (as form of capital punishment)/to chop
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: Wow he send weapons to the enemy who beheads Christians.
sentences.chinese: 哇他竟然給斬殺基督徒的敵人運送武器。

sentences.english: She was personally responsible for killing 20 of the seasoned warriors.
sentences.chinese: 沃薩一人便斬殺20名久經沙場的曼德洛戰士。

sentences.english: He fought many battles, and took the strong holds of all, and slew the kings of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 他身經百戰，攻佔了許多要塞，斬殺了各地的君王。

sentences.english: Impale now affects Overpower instead of Execute.
sentences.chinese: 刺穿現在影響壓制而非斬殺。

definition: to shoot dead (with a gun, or bow and arrow)
an execution/to put sb to death
to besiege/to beleaguer/to attack from all sides/to jointly speak or write against sb
a thousand pounds hangs by a thread (idiom)/imminent peril/a matter of life or death
